text: Vano ulha unookhalha nkwaha wo neraru uwa uwaninyu ni mena akinowa kaakhalha nsigo uwaninyu, akinowa kaavekelha ittu wa ntu. Ukhalhawaya ittu inaavia aka kihii nhakhu inyu nansho kinowaaviani mwaattiva mwaashinene. Phi malhemalhelho, manyanaangoro waashungera achishaana aya chittu, kuhiwe ashaana waashungera manyanaangoro aya chittu.
